name: 林敏勝
objective:
布林代數與邏輯閘，組合邏輯，算術演算邏輯，同步循序邏
輯，演繹狀態機，非同步循序邏輯。
schedule:
Week  1. Introduction
Week  2. Digital Computers and Information
Week  3. Combinational Logic Circuits (I)
Week  4. Combinational Logic Circuits (II)
Week  5. Combinational Logic Circuits (III)
Week  6. Combinational Logic Design (I)
Week  7. Combinational Logic Design (II)
Week  8. Combinational Logic Design (III)
Week  9. Midterm Exam.
Week 10. Sequential Circuits (I)
Week 11. Sequential Circuits (II)
Week 12. Registers and Register Transfers
Week 13. Memory Basics
Week 14. Computer Design Basics (I)
Week 15. Computer Design Basics (II)
Week 16. Instruction Set Architecture (I)
Week 17. Instruction Set Architecture (II)
Week 18. Final Exam.
materials: Logic and Computer Design Fundamentals, by M. Morris Mano & Charles R. Kime, Pearson
